column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''24''' is the twenty-fourth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
*   "Sauron Defeated: A Linguistic Review" — [[Carl F. Hostetter]].
** '''The above article is previously unpublished primary material from the Tolkien archives.'''
* "'Verbs, Syntax! Hooray!': A Preliminary Assessment of Adunaic Grammar" — [[Patrick H. Wynne]] and Carl F. Hostetter.
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
